title: Stir fried vegetables with oyster sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oyster sauce', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '2 tablespoons water', '1/2 teaspoon cornflour', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1/2 medium onion, finely sliced', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '100g baby sweetcorn, halved on the diagonal', '100g sugar snap peas or mange tout', '1 red pepper, sliced', '1 carrot, cut into matchsticks', '2 tablespoons roughly chopped coriander']
